    Public Methods

    public getRuntimeCapabilities(): Promise<object> source

    Returns as a promise RuntimeCapabilities json object with all available capabilities of the runtime. If it was not yet persisted in the Storage Manager it collects all required info from the platform and saves in the storage manager.

    Return:

    Promise<object>

    public isAvailable(capability: *): Promise<boolean> source

    returns as a promise a boolean according to available capabilities.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    capability *

    Return:

    Promise<boolean>

    public update(): * source

    it refreshes previously collected capabilities and updates the storage manager

    Return:

    *
